title: Dependability and Data Analytics: A Match Made in the Cloud
description: We live in a data-driven world as everyone around has been telling us for some time. Everything is generating data, in volumes and at high rates, from the sensors embedded in our physical spaces to the large number of machines in data centers which are being monitored for a wide variety of metrics. The question that we pose is: Can all this data be used for improving the dependability of cloud computing systems?

title: Life in our school
description: Here is a quick overview of life in ECE, from the research, teaching, and engagement angles. This was created to celebrate the naming of our school as the Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering. Hope this piques your interest to join us. My take on it starts at 5:56.

title: Army Research Lab funded A2I2 project on assured autonomy
description: AI Assured Autonomy Innovation Institute (A2I2) project at Purdue and Princeton, 2020-25. Led by Purdue: Saurabh Bagchi (PI), Somali Chaterji, Mung Chiang, David Inouye, and Princeton: Prateek Mittal.

title: Overview of IoT systems research as part of Purdue WHIN
IoT and Sensor Update for Purdue Ag-WHIN
description: Saurabh Bagchi, Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering and Computer Science at Purdue University, gives an update on IoT and Sensor activities happening at the university related to digital agriculture and how they benefit the Wabash Heartland Innovation Network (WHIN). This update occurred in December 2020 and reflects activities in year 3 of the partnership between Purdue and WHIN.

title: CERIAS - Symposium 2018 - Human Biases Meet Cybersecurity of Embedded and Networked Systems
description: CERIAS Tech Talk - Human Biases Meet Cybersecurity of Embedded and Networked Systems""

title: Dependability for Computer Systems meets Data Analytics
description: Virginia Tech Distinguished Seminar\nDependability for Computer Systems meets Data Analytics

title: CERIAS Talk on Zero Day Attack Detection for Enterprise Systems
Big Data for Reliability and Security
description: This course teaches the principles and practices of big data for improving the reliability and the security of computing systems. It exemplifies the principles through real-world examples and provides challenging programming problems based on novel datasets.
